title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Ripple (XRP) Jumps 9.4% as Index Trades Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Stellar (XLM) was also a top performer, gaining 6.1% from Thursday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3298.82, up 2.9% (+92.48) since yesterday's close.

Nineteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: XRP (+9.4%) and XLM (+6.1%).

Laggards: APT (+0.0%) and ADA (+0.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading up 2.9% with 19 of 20 assets trading higher, indicating broad market gains and positive momentum.
